= Installation Introduction =

This software has been developed to run under Ubuntu 10.04.3 LTS, but should also work on other Linux distributions and versions. Installation requires minimal understanding of how to use and administer Linux systems.

Start with the [InstallationBasic Basic Setup] and then continue with the other optional installation depending on requirements:
  * [InstallationBasic Basic Setup]
  * [InstallationWebInterface Web Interface]
  * [InstallationTime Time Synchronisation]
